cause.description:
The North Coast Men's Chorus (Cleveland Choral Arts Association) is the premier choral ensemble for gay and gay-affirming men in Northeast Ohio. The North Coast Men's Chorus performs 3 major concert series each season; a December holiday performance, a March themed performance, and a June Pride month performance. NCMC does additional performances and community events throughout the year.
1. present entertaining, quality performances for diverse audiences
2. provide a supportive environment for NCMC members
3. be a positive presence in the gay community and beyond
cause.mission: Many voices, singing as one, the North Coast Men's Chorus will be an integral and valued member of the NE Ohio Arts Community through the music we sing, the pride we feel, and the people we cherish.
cause.name: North Coast Men's Chorus
